Hey, Premium users, we just want to say that we have added one awesome feature for you.
And this is Agent ... wait for it ... Forwarding!

There are some bug fixes and performance improvements for everybody as well.

Enjoy!

WHAT'S NEW:
· Identities: Combine a username with password or key into one Identity and use it for many hosts. It's extremely useful.
· Groups: Organize hosts into groups and groups into subgroups. Set shared settings (e.g color scheme, font size, identity for a group of hosts).
· Tags: Mark hosts with tags. What else to say?!
· Notifications about active sessions in the background that are going to be closed.
· Improved the external call mechanism for better third party integration

WHAT'S FIXED:

· New icon. We think that the new one is nicer :)
- A lot of UI improvements. Now it looks really clean. And we keep thinking about how to do it even clearer.
· Fixed offline mode for premium users.
· Fixed UI for selecting an action for volume buttons or shake.
· Fixed crash on iOS 8.3 when trying to save an encrypted key without a passphrase.
· Fixed other crashes related to iOS 8.3.

Please notice that you are welcome to report about any issues via the “Support&Feedback” section in the app.
Our team thanks all beta testers for helpful bug reports.

First of all, we'd like to present a new cool feature for premium subscribers:

Snippets! These are the pieces of code that you can preload to your Serverauditor account to use later. One snippet can be easily run on multiple active connections. In addition, a snippet can be executed automatically when a host connection starts. This is just our first step in that direction so more enhancements are on their way therefore we are waiting for your feedback and suggestions.

And here are some list of new features and fixes for everybody:
· xterm-256colors support
· Tap on URL in the terminal window to open it.
· Dark Keyboard support
· Hosts & Groups management improvements. Now several hosts can be moved to a group all at once.
· Copy & Paste fixes
· OS's icons OpenBSD, NetBSD, SUSE
· UI and stability improvements as usual

First of all, thank you all who has helped us to test the last beta version. For those who would like to become a beta tester, please sign up https://serverauditor.com/beta/signup

In this version, we’ve completely reworked the PathPicker feature and now it's a powerful SFTP client. Bear in mind that this is a first SFTP version so we're looking forward to your feedback. As usual, the new build has heaps of UI and stability tweaks.

P.S. Follow us on twitter @serverauditor to get new updates for all platforms where Serverauditor is available.

This is a release with urgent bug fixes for the next iOS. Thanks to all of you who tested it on iOS beta versions and reported bugs to us.

For those who had problems with the xterm-256color mode, please check the new option on the Settings screen. Now you can switch back to xterm or vt100.

For those who would like to become a beta tester of Serverauditor, please sign up here https://serverauditor.com/beta/signup

P.S. Follow us on twitter: @serverauditor to get updates for Serverauditor on other platforms!

Ladies and gentlemen, we’re glad to present you new features!

· The feature you’ve been long waiting for: Two-Factor Authorization!
· For iPhone 6(+) S-series users: We’ve added 3D Touch, and Home Screen Quick Action support
· iPad Pro users: You’re now able to use the native keyboard, which is gorgeous!
· Also, on iOS 9, we’ve fixed the issue with the empty embedded browser view after clicking links in the terminal

To all of you who tested the iOS beta version, and to who have reported bugs, thank you! This release wouldn’t have been possible without your support. For those who are interested to become Serverauditor beta tester, please sign up here: https://serverauditor.com/beta/signup

P.S. Want to stay up-to-date with Serverauditor? Please follow us on twitter: @serverauditor. Also for other platforms!

Hi everyone! Have you heard about the company behind Serverauditor before? Let’s meet each other! We are Crystalnix. Apart from reinventing the terminal for mobile and desktop (thank you all for your incredible support, btw), we develop user-centric mobile apps with a cloud backend. If you are looking for a decent mobile partner, we feel it might be the next successful collaboration. Drop our CTO Dmitry(dl@crystalnix.com) a line. Anyway we’d be happy to stay in touch on Twitter, @CrystalnixHQ.

And there is an update for today :)

· Open links from the terminal in the embedded browser or directly in Safari
· Multiple internal bugs have been fixed

Ready to help us making Serverauditor even greater? Become a pre-release feature tester! And be the first to lay your hands on new releases, even before release. Sign up here: https://serverauditor.com/beta/signup or mail us your AppleID: beta@serverauditor.com​

What’s New:
· Support for two new types of MAC hash, HMAC-SHA2-256 and HMAC-SHA2-512 
· Now Diffie-Hellman Group Key Exchange SHA-256 is supported. From now on, only your car keys remain unprotected against the NSA poking around

What’s fixed: 
· We’ve done a few minor security updates
· Those registration issues signing up as a premium user, you’ve been reporting lately. From now on a smooth and flawless registration process. Thanks for informing us!

Also:
Did you know that a host group can be configured? The group’s configuration is shared over the hosts inside a group! Unless you explicitly define certain settings, a host will automatically inherit its parent group configuration. Using groups to organize hosts that share a specific port, username, password, key, snippet or even color scheme will save you lots of time. Time which you can spend more usefully, like pirating anime for example!

News:
We’re about to launch some neat UI improvements, including Split View. If you can’t wait any longer and you want to get your hands dirty with our beta version, right now, before anyone else does. If you’re ready to help us whack some bugs. Then sign up as a beta tester here: https://serverauditor.com/beta/signup.

The moment you all have been waiting for - ECDSA, Ed25519, ChaCha20-Poly1305 and Curve25519 support!

Just have a look at this list of awesome features that we are happy to introduce in this build:
  • ECDSA, Ed25519, ChaCha20-Poly1305 and Curve25519 support
  • Improved SSH Agent - add, remove and list keys from your ssh sessions using ssh-add keys
  • Hotkeys to quickly navigate through the app and perform basic actions using hardware keyboard
  • Drag & Drop in SFTP to quickly move, import and export files
  • History synchronisation

We continue releasing new features to improve your admin experience
  • Support of Eastern-Asian input (Japanese, Chinese, Korean)
  • New option to set encoding (UTF-8, UTF-16, etc) for Host or Group
  • New option to set environment variables for a Host
  • Added Known Hosts synchronization
  • New premium feature - location tracking of active sessions with a side effect - background sessions!

Our team keeps improving Termius with another maintenance update
• Fixed compatibility with Mikrotik routers.
• Fixed SFTP to enable importing files from third-party apps
• Improved connections history
• Fixed Rate Us dialog - apologies, we didn't mean to show it so often

If you still have issues with Agent Forwarding - please send us your details to support@termius.com. That is a tricky one.

If you still have issues with Agent Forwarding - please send us your details to support@termius.com. That is a tricky one.

• Fixed SFTP to enable importing files from third-party apps
• Improved connections history
• Fixed Rate Us dialog - apologies, we didn't mean to show it so often

If you still have issues with Agent Forwarding - please send us your details to support@termius.com. That is a tricky one.

Hi everyone!
In this new build, we are happy to introduce to you the refreshed UI! (ﾉ◕ヮ◕)ﾉ*:･ﾟ
It is now in tune with the latest iOS, and also it has that one feature that everyone has been waiting - the dark mode!

But there is even more:
• Autocomplete in the command line
• Quick actions on tabs: close, clone, change the color scheme and rename!

In this update, we've fixed rendering issues that some of you may have experienced. And also we've added an option to draw bold symbols with the bright color palette, you may now enable it in the app settings.

Thanks to everyone who sends us feedback and bug reports, you are awesome!

Our goal is not just to develop the best SSH client for iOS; we are making a platform for system and network administration. Hence Termius shines when used on mobile and desktop devices which is an entirely new experience. To get a taste of it, you can get a free 14-day trial. If you are not sure if it can justify paying for the whole year from this release you can also pay monthly​

We are happy to release two new features:
· Snippets can be run on multiple hosts so you can work on a cluster from your iOS device.
· Siri shortcuts to start a new connection to a host. To try this feature create a host and connect to it, next find a new suggestion from Termius in the Shortcuts app.

Launched Group Sharing 2.0 introducing new features for Termius for Teams:   
- Team members can save their own credentials for shared hosts and groups.
- A new Editor role for teams is now available. Editors can add, edit, and delete hosts inside shared groups.
